actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to permit federally chartered savings and loan associations located in New York to offer checking accounts to the extent that similar State chartered institutions in New York are permitted to do so.

summary.text: Amends the Home Owners' Loan Act to permit federally chartered savings and loan associations located in New York to offer checking accounts to the extent that similar State-chartered institutions in New York are permitted to do so.

titles.title: A bill to permit federally chartered savings and loan associations located in New York to offer checking accounts to the extent that similar State chartered institutions in New York are permitted to do so.
